EmailTemplate.name: PO number NOT available on Quote/Proposal
EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia Acknowledgment of {!User.Name} accepted recommmendation - Reference {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank You!
Nokia acknowledges that you agree to activate the actual software features proposed in the recommendation under Frame contract {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Frame_contract_reference__c} for {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Proposal_Recommendation_Type__c} .
